attributes.title: Insights on E = mc² - Intensity is Continuity
attributes.description:
Insights on E = mc² - Intensity is Continuity For a Vegertarian

Paramhamsa Nithyananda debunks theory of major scientists by reflecting into the capability of the brain & very clearly defines how a non vegetarian diet consuming person's brain is different from that of a vegetarian person's brain and how it leads to the non-grasping ability of non-vegetarian person. A vegetarian can perceive why intensity can be continuous and how that person can create and charge a dry battery which doesn't lose intensity and can function forever without being charged.





----
Music: Simon Wilkinson - Royalty Free Ambient Space Music (promo video) For Documentary & Film
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zk3Y28-fGJc
----
